relics.name: Curse Brand
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse, Awaken a random card.
relics.flavorText: This mark is reserved for the failed and fallen.

relics.name: Darksteel Hammer
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, Upgrade a random card.
relics.flavorText: This blacksmith's tool is steeped in cursed energy.

relics.name: Padlock
relics.description: At the beginning of each combat, you may Seal up to 5 cards from your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This lock was once used to seal the cage of an evil force.

relics.name: Banana Peel
relics.description: When you are inflicted with Weak, inflict 1 Weak on all enemies.

relics.name: Cursed Egg
relics.description: Cleansed Curse reward cards are Upgraded.

relics.name: Jade Seal
relics.description: Whenever you Seal a card, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact from a forgotten empire.

relics.name: Sticky Barb
relics.description: When you are inflicted with Vulnerable, inflict 1 Vulnerable on all enemies.

relics.name: Cursed Locket
relics.flavorText: Sealed with dark energy, it burns to the touch.

relics.name: Evil Eye
relics.description: After each battle, heal 1 HP for each Curse remaining in your deck.

relics.name: Lucky Clover
relics.description: At the beginning of each combat, gain 1 Plated Armor for each unique curse in your deck.

relics.name: Neow's Hatred
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, add a Curse that can be cleansed to your deck.
relics.flavorText: It feels like you were brought back just to fail.

relics.name: Death Brand
relics.description: Replaces Curse Brand. Whenever you draw a Curse, Awaken a random card in your hand. Draw an additional card each turn.
relics.flavorText: This brand marks its bearer for execution.

relics.name: Fractured Prism
relics.description: Choose a card in your deck. Your next 5 card rewards will include a copy of that card.
relics.flavorText: The cracked surface creates exactly 5 reflections.

potions.name: Insight Potion
potions.description: Awaken the cards in your hand 1 time.

keywords.name: Acceptance Stance
keywords.description: Your Attacks deal double damage but cost 1 more.

keywords.name: Asylum Orbs
keywords.description:
Channels a different Orb depending on the rarity of the Sealed Card:
Common: Lightning
Uncommon: Frost
Rare: Plasma
Status: Sludge
Curse: Dreg

keywords.name: Awaken
keywords.description:
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.
A card can be Awakened more than once.

keywords.name: Awoken
keywords.description: Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken II
keywords.description: Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken III
keywords.description:
Draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken IV
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken IX
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken V
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken VI
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken VII
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken VIII
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Awoken X
keywords.description:
Recover HP and draw a card when played.
Awoken attacks deal more damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects.

keywords.name: Blighted
keywords.description: When Blighted exceeds an enemy's current HP, it will be killed and transformed into a special curse that will be added to your deck. Blighted enemies will heal 10% of their missing HP each turn.

keywords.name: Cleanse
keywords.description: Some Curses can be Cleansed by fulfilling the condition on the card. When fulfilled, the curse can be replaced with your choice of card from another class.

keywords.name: Denial Stance
keywords.description: When entering this stance, gain [E] [E] . Exiting this stance ends your turn.

keywords.name: Dreg Orb
keywords.description: Orb: Draws curses each turn. When Evoked, Awakens a card.

keywords.name: Fortitude
keywords.description: Opposite of Vulnerable. Decreases damage taken by 25%

keywords.name: Might
keywords.description: Opposite of Weak. Increases damage dealt by 25%

keywords.name: Sealed
keywords.description: Sealed cards remain in the discard pile when you shuffle and are un-sealed. Sealing a card triggers any exhaust or discard effects listed on the card.

keywords.name: Sludge Orb
keywords.description: Orb: Increases potency each turn. When Evoked, draws cards.

keywords.name: Sturdiness
keywords.description: Opposite of Frail. Increases Block gained by 25%

mods.name: DregsMod
mods.description:
Adds the Dregs.
        - Cleanse curses to collect cards from other classes
        - Curse your enemies
        - Try not to die
